original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na sa asavam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na sa asavaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo
analyzed: hetu paccayā āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ

original: nasāsavo ca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sa āsavaḥ ca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavañca āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na sāsavam ca āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
